lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: Ah, Sosuke! You [type:verb,eng:startled,jpn:びっくりさせた] me. Need something?

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: I have some [type:noun, eng:questions, jpn:質問] for you.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was in my [type:noun, eng:bedroom, jpn:寝室].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:garden shed, jpn:庭の小屋].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:garage, jpn:ガレージ].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I [type:adverb,eng:really,jpn:本当に] was in the [type:noun, eng:garage, jpn:ガレージ].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:yard, jpn:庭の小屋].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was [type:verb, eng:sleeping in, jpn:寝坊していた].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I wasn't in the [type:noun, eng:bedroom, jpn:寝室]... Not until right now anyway.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: Well... I was [type:verb, eng:building, jpn:作っていた] my [type:noun,eng:time machine,jpn:タイムマシン].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: It’s almost ready, just missing a few parts.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was [type:verb, eng:looking, jpn:探していた] for [type:noun,eng:parts,jpn:部品] for my [type:noun,eng:time machine,jpn:タイムマシン].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: [type:phrase,eng:Hard to find,jpn:見つけにくい] the [type:adjective,eng:right,jpn:正しい] [type:noun,eng:parts,jpn:部品] these days.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was [type:verb, eng:fixing, jpn:直していた] the [type:noun, eng:lawn mower, jpn:芝刈り機].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was [type:verb, eng:testing, jpn:テストしていた] my [type:noun, eng:time machine, jpn:タイムマシン], but it’s still missing one key part.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: If I could fix it, we could go back and stop the [type:noun,eng:cake,jpn:ケーキ] from disappearing!

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: I was [type:verb, eng:mowing, jpn:刈っていた] the [type:noun, eng:lawn, jpn:芝].

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: No, I haven’t seen your [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ] all day.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: [type:interjection, eng:No, jpn:いいえ] I didn’t [type:verb, eng:eat, jpn:食べる] it… [type:conjunction, eng:but, jpn:でも] if my [type:noun, eng:time machine, jpn:タイムマシン] [type:verb, eng:worked, jpn:動いた], we could go back and [type:verb, eng:grab, jpn:取る] it before anyone else!

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: Help me find the missing parts, and maybe we can do that.

lines.speaker: Ichiro
lines.text: Alright, Sosuke… I’m [type:verb,eng:building,jpn:作ってる] a [type:noun, eng:time machine, jpn:タイムマシン].
